description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Canggu, Indonesia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Canggu Bali Villa Luxury with Marble Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Escape to a romantic villa retreat overlooking emerald-green rice fields at the charming Astera Luxury Resort & Spa Canggu by Ini Vie Hospitality. Nestled in southwest Bali, this soothing haven is framed by lush foliage and rolling green hills. Float in the tranquil marble infinity pool overlooking the serene horizon, indulge in traditional massage treatments while relishing beautiful natural landscapes at Svaha Spa, or savour dazzling dishes served in the comfort of your private villa.

hotels.title: Bali: Generous Three-Bedroom Family Villas in Canggu with Private Pool & Sun Terrace
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of laidback Canggu living in a stunning private residence in the heart of Berawa, the epicentre of Bali's surf, dining and shopping scene. Each curated three-bedroom home is a masterpiece of design, with spacious living areas, fully equipped kitchens and private pools. Savour vibrant local flavours in nearby restaurants, explore the cultural treasures of Ubud, take a scenic drive to the majestic Mount Batur, or simply relax in your private sanctuary.

hotels.title: Five-Star Bali Pool Villas near Canggu
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in an unexpected Eden amid the lush greenery at The Santai by LifestyleRetreats, a stone's throw from Bali's bohemian Canggu. Leave the hustle and bustle behind for an authentic Balinese experience at this five-star collection of pristine private pool villas with 24-hour butler service, set amid lush rice paddies and temples - just a 15-minute drive from the bright lights of Seminyak. Escape with family and friends and stay in a two-bedroom villa for four or a three-bedroom villa for six. The perfect balance of relaxation and adrenaline-worthy waves (the area, and Canggu specifically, are home to some of the best surf breaks in Bali), The Santai by LifestyleRetreats promises a tranquil villa retreat that fuses Asian cuisine, relaxing massage treatments, irresistible signature cocktails and carefree, sun-kissed days lounging by your private pool.

hotels.title: Canggu Beachfront Elegance with Six Dining Venues & Spa
hotels.description: Located on the shores of central Canggu, this elegant retreat is ideally positioned for tranquil beach days, shopping and nightlife. Savour international flavours at the hotel's six restaurants and bars, including Cure, helmed by celebrity chef Andrew Walsh. Sip on a refreshing cocktail in a private cabana by the infinity pool, look out at the boundless Indian Ocean and indulge in lavish spa treatments at Regent Spa & Wellness. Venture out to explore the nearby Tanah Lot Temple, a stunning sea temple perched on a rocky outcrop, or browse the eclectic boutiques of Seminyak, just a short drive away.

hotels.title: Canggu Five-Star Laidback Beachfront Luxury with Ultra-Cool Beach Club
hotels.description: For the laidback traveller looking for a splash of luxury, the world-class COMO Uma Canggu breaks the mould for breathtaking escapes. Spend balmy days at the sleek and sophisticated COMO Beach Club, where Indian Ocean panoramas are the backdrop to barrel-aged cocktails, poolside dining, live music, DJ sets and daybeds. For a touch of pampering, float over to Shambhala spa for Balinese treatments and steam rooms that are guaranteed to invigorate body and soul.

hotels.vendor_name: Canggu Cabana Resort by Ini Vie Hospitality
hotels.title: Beachfront Canggu Suite Escape with Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Discover bliss at this boutique five-star beachfront Canggu oasis. You’ll be just moments from some of Canggu’s hottest spots, including The Lawn and Old Man day clubs, as well as the region's legendary dining experiences. Begin each morning with a dip in the gently curving infinity pool, dine at Seabird Restaurant or head to the resort’s wellness centre, Svaha Spa Nelayan, for massages and holistic treatments backed by timeless tradition.

hotels.vendor_name: Swarga Suites Bali Berawa, Marclan Collection
hotels.title: Five-Star Bali All-Suite Retreat Seconds from Berawa Beach
hotels.description: Authentic Balinese beachfront luxury awaits at five-star Swarga Suites Bali Berawa, Marclan Collection, overlooking the crashing waves of the Indian Ocean. Choose your preferred style of relaxation - will it be on the sand by the turquoise ocean, in the shallows of the infinity pool or with a serene spa treatment? Treat your tastebuds to a crisp, cool cocktail as you watch the sun set in a blaze of gold, followed by a dinner showcasing local flavours at Ketumbar Bistro & Bar.

hotels.title: Stylish Secluded Bali Villa with Private Pool
hotels.description: Discover the tranquil seclusion of Teratai Villa Canggu, a boutique selection of private pool villas in the tropical neighbourhood of Canggu. Feel at ease surrounded by the seemless blend of Japanese and Balinese design in this home-away-from-home that you will never want to leave. Spend your mornings lounging on the day bed and indulging in a refreshing floating breakfast before heading to the lively beaches, stylish cafes and pumping beach clubs nearby.

hotels.title: Romantic Balinese Villa in the Heart of Canggu with Private Pool
hotels.description: Amp up the romance when you escape to Manca Villa in the beach-chic town of Canggu on Bali's south coast. It's all too easy to forget the rest of the world and while away the days splashing about in your private swimming pool, enjoying fresh fruits out on your alfresco dining area or indulging in a private dinner for two that's been sprinkled with rose petals. When you're ready to venture outside, the beach clubs, restaurants and cafes of Canggu are at your fingertips.

hotels.title: Five-Star Boutique Beachfront Art-Inspired Canggu Escape
hotels.description: Positioned on the southwest shores of Batu Bolong Beach in the popular Canggu, you’ll find the boutique Hotel Tugu Bali, a unique art-inspired retreat filled with a world-class collection of museum-quality antiquities and blessed with one of the island's most stunning sunsets. Surrounded by private gardens - within easy reach of Canggu’s stylish bars, restaurants and shops - this boutique gem is a one-of-a-kind destination where creativity, luxury and tranquillity blissfully merge. When you’re ready to unwind, Hotel Tugu Bali’s luxurious suites - brimming with character and unique timber interiors - are waiting for you, while the onsite restaurants will take you on a culinary journey through Indonesian, Chinese and Japanese fare.
